concept.title: Testing Your Deployment
concept.shortdesc: This topic details what you should test when you want to make sure your deployment is working.

section.title: DNS
section.p: To verify your DNS settings, we recommend the following test plan.

ul.li:
Verify that instances can ping their:
Private DNS name
Public DNS name

Verify that instances are pingable on their public DNS names from:
Outside the cloud
An instance inside the cloud
